actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit

official_title: To amend the Community Reinvestment Act of 1977 to exempt depository institutions which have total assets of $250,000,000 or less from the requirements of such Act.

summary.text: Small Bank CRA Exemption Act - Amends the Community Reinvestment Act of 1977 to exclude depository institutions whose total assets do not exceed $250 million from its definition of regulated financial institution (thus exempting such entities from the requirements of the Act).

titles.title: To amend the Community Reinvestment Act of 1977 to exempt depository institutions which have total assets of $250,000,000 or less from the requirements of such Act.
